subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: DeGrom doubled and scored the Mets’ only run since Sunday, when another pitcher, Steven Matz, had four R.B.I., and the Cubs won the season series, 7-0.
snippet: DeGrom doubled and scored the Mets’ only run since Sunday, when another pitcher, Steven Matz, had four R.B.I., and the Cubs won the season series, 7-0.
